definition: to pull/to tear/(of cloth, thread etc) to buy/to chat/to gossip/(coll.) (Tw) ridiculous/hokey
to speak/to talk/to converse/to chat/to discuss

sentences.english: I didn't understand the chatter, almost as much as they.
sentences.chinese: 我不明白這喋喋不休的扯談，他們也差不多如此。

sentences.english: Shit , mate, you're lowering the flag.
The idea that a job is the most secure way to generate income is just silly.
sentences.chinese: 工作是讓你得到穩定收入的最安全的方法完全是扯談。

sentences.english: At last , i wanna say, this is bullshit for all the things.
sentences.chinese: 最後，我想說的是，這一事件純屬扯談。

sentences.english: The following are some of the most common ones.
sentences.chinese: 下面就是一些我們最爲常見的扯談之說。

sentences.english: At first this myth might seem true.
sentences.chinese: 起先這一扯談觀點看似正確。
